ElkCraft Description

ElkCraft is a Minecraft clone made with C++/OpenGL. In this game you'll be able to build your own world! You are free to customize your playing experience by configuring the game how you want (Config files). You like survival ? It's up to you. You prefer building ? It's your choice! Play the way you want, download ElkCraft for free today!

Features
  • Mining
  • Crafting
  • Building
  • Health system
  • Hunger system
  • Day and night
  • Save and load
  • User advanced configuration
Controls (More in README.txt) Move Jump Sprint Open crafting menu Craft current recipe Delete current item Break block Place block Return to main menu Requirements
  • Up-to-date video card drivers (OpenGL 4.6 or higher)
  • 500MB of RAM
